title: Mendeleev on the Periodic Law: Selected Writings, 1869 - 1905
description: This is the first English-language collection of Mendeleev's most important writings on the periodic law. Thirteen papers and essays reflect the era corresponding to the initial establishment of the periodic law, the priority disputes and experimental confirmations, and the ultimate acceptance for the law and increasing international recognition for Mendeleev.
author: Dmitri Mendeleev
